title: Oyo checks into premium resorts and hotels space with Palette
description: Oyo said Palette resorts will be located in popular leisure destinations across India, while also catering to business leisure or bleisure travellers looking for quick getaways and staycations. The company said it has started 10 Palette resorts as a pilot project in cities such as Jaipur, Hyderabad, Digha, Mumbai, Chennai, Manesar and Bengaluru.
